JobFullDesc: At Deloitte, we're helping government solve the country's most critical challenges.We're working side by side with our government clients to design and deliver projects that matter to millions of people. It's challenging and gratifying. And we're hiring passionate professionals to help us get it done. Join us and work alongside the industry's most talented professionals and former government executives. They choose Deloitte because we offer meaningful work for top government clients with wide-ranging missions. They stay with Deloitte because they discover a thriving practice that provides customizable career options with endless opportunities to grow and excel in a collaborative environment.  Pursue your passion and build your career at Deloitte.  The Team  Transparency, innovation, collaboration, sustainability: these are the hallmark issues shaping government initiatives today. Deloitte's Government and Public Service (GPS) practice is passionate about making an impact with lasting change. Carrying out missions in the GPS practice requires fresh thinking and a creative approach. We collaborate with teams from across our organization in order to bring the full breadth of Deloitte, its commercial and public sector expertise, to best support our clients. Our aspiration is to be the premier integrated solutions provider in helping to transform the marketplace.  Join us, and play a key role in helping to design our clients' roadmap to the future!  Candidates must have an active TS/SCI Clearance with Polygraph.  Skill Sets Needed:  Federal Financial Management, Accounting, and Audit Professionals   IT Audit and IT Controls Professionals   Business Process Consultants   Supply Chain Consultants   Requirements Analyst and Testers   Strategy, Change Mgmt, and Communications Professionals   Workforce planning Consultants   Human Capital, HR Service Delivery Instructional Design, and Org Strategy Consultants  Data Analytics, Computer Forensics, Cyber Investigation Skills  Software Engineers: Java, ASP.net  Systems Engineers  ServiceNow Developers and functional professionals  Identity Management and Privacy  Front End Developers & UI/UX  SharePoint Developers  Business Intelligence Analysts  Targeters and Intel Analysts
